channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- PPDM Reporting (PowerProtect Data Manager)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- PPDM Reporting (PowerProtect Data Manager)

item.title: CVE-2023-28062|2024-08-02T12:30:23.628Z -- dell -- ppdm%20reporting%20%28powerprotect%20data%20manager%29
item.description: Dell PPDM versions 19.12, 19.11 and 19.10, contain an improper access control vulnerability. A remote authenticated malicious user with low privileges could potentially exploit this vulnerability to bypass intended access restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.
